Jacket in soft pile with a high collar, zip down the front and dropped shoulders. Elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and narrow ties under the bust. Decorative gathers at the shoulders, a gathered yoke at the back to add width, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless playsuit in stretch denim made from a cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck, buttons at the top and a seam at the waist.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with flounced trims, a wrapover top, concealed press-stud at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and skirt with a sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with flounced trims, a wrapover top, concealed press-stud at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and skirt with a sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.

Jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a lace yoke and an opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length lace sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, an elasticated seam and sewn-in tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a lace yoke and an opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length lace sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, an elasticated seam and sewn-in tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband designed to hold in and shape the waist that also contains a concealed key pocket. Legs with mesh details, an opening for the heels and anti-slip protectors on the soles of the feet for a better grip when practising without a yoga mat.
